item.title: Absorbing Your Friends’ Powers
item.description: Richard Ham­ming was a math­e­mat­i­cian who worked at Bell Labs dur­ing the 1940s-1970s. He had a habit of sit­ting down with sci­en­tists in other fields and ask­ing them “What are the im­por­tant prob­lems of your field?” After they ex­plained their field’s most im­por­tant open prob­lem, h......
